name: Catch Me! (Bubble11)
description:
Play with sound on for the best experience.

Find the key and open the door before Jack can catch you and get the remote.

This game has three levels, a simple story, sounds and music. It was made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 86. The limitation was "No Stopping", and this game incorporates it by  the player not being able to stop without getting catched.

Controls
  • Move: WASD
  • Check objects: Left mouse button
  • Find the key by checking objects
